name: Aceternity UI
description: A customizable form built on top of shadcn's input and label, with a touch of framer motion

props.Description: Additional CSS classes to apply to the input component.
Specifies the type of input (e.g., "text", "password"). Inherits all standard HTML input types.
Spreads the rest of the input attributes (e.g., placeholder, disabled, value, etc.) from React's InputHTMLAttributes.
Ref forwarding is used to allow parent components to directly access the DOM input element.

usage_notes: A customizable form built on top of shadcn's input and label, with a touch of framer motion
